General.Name: Arab National Bank
General.Description: Arab National Bank provides various banking products and services. The company operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, Treasury, and Investment and Brokerage Services segments. It offers current, savings, and Murabaha accounts, as well as time deposits; personal loan, auto lease, and real estate financing, as well as consumer credit advisory services; loans and advances; credit facilities; letters of credit and letters of guarantee; and credit and debit cards. The company also provides investment products for individuals, investment and asset management comprising dealing, managing, arranging, advising, and custody of securities; contract financing; and syndicated corporate loans. In addition, it offers wholesale banking, credit financing, and small and medium enterprises financing, project and structured finance, e-trading, treasury, international instruments, bonds and SUKUKS, merchant, collection, liquidity management, specialized market, fintech and open banking, internet banking, guarantees, inward and outward bills for collection and avalisation, phone banking, and ATM, as well as agency services. Further, the company leasing of heavy equipment; and purchasing, sale, and leasing of land and real estate services. The company serves individuals, corporate and institutional customers, and small to medium sized businesses through its branches in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the United Kingdom. Arab National Bank was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
